data.eml:eml: Review and three new species of the flat bug genus Neochelonoderus Hoberlandt, 1967 from East Africa (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Aradidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heiss, Ernst, Grebennikov, Vasily (2015): Review and three new species of the flat bug genus Neochelonoderus Hoberlandt, 1967 from East Africa (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Aradidae). Zootaxa 3947 (4): 581-589, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3947.4.9
